  • 单选
    Until recently astronomers have been puzzled by the fate of red giant and supergiant stars.
    1. offer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar clouds offer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar cloudsoffer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar clouds
    2. describe the conditions that result in a star‘s expiring as a supernova.
    3. discuss new evidence concerning the composition of planetary nebulas.
    4. explain why fewer stars than predicted expire as supernovas
    5. survey conflicting theories concerning the composition of circumstellar clouds
    ✔

    对耗时6秒 2017-10-24 17:40:09参考答案为：B

  • 单选
    Until recently astronomers have been puzzled by the fate of red giant and supergiant stars.
    • offer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar clouds offer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar cloudsoffer a method of calculating the age of circum-stellar clouds
    • describe the conditions that result in a star‘s expiring as a supernova.
    • discuss new evidence concerning the composition of planetary nebulas.
    • explain why fewer stars than predicted expire as supernovas
    • survey conflicting theories concerning the composition of circumstellar clouds
    ✖

    错耗时6秒 2017-10-24 17:40:09参考答案为：B 你的答案为：C
